cocktails.name: Margarita
ingredients: 2 lime wedges and coarse sea salt, for glass rimming
steps: Run lime wedge around the outer rims of 2 rocks glasses and dip rims in salt.
In a cocktail shaker, combine tequila, Cointreau, and lime juice. Fill with ice and shake until thoroughly chilled
Fill glasses with fresh ice and strain margarita into both glasses. Garnish with lime wheels and serve.

cocktails.name: Mojito
steps: Place sugar and mint leaves in a serving glass, and gently muddle just until the leaves release their oils.
Fill glass with ice. Add rum and lime juice. Stir to combine.
Top with club soda.

cocktails.name: Pi√±a Colada
ingredients: 2 1/2 ounces (75ml) white or gold rum, kept in freezer until freezer-cold
steps: In an airtight plastic container, combine pineapple, coconut cream, simple syrup, and 3/4 ounce lime juice, and transfer to freezer until frozen.
In a blender, combine frozen pineapple mixture with ice-cold rum and ice and blend until thick and slushy.
Pour into a large glass, garnish with pineapple and/or a cherry, and serve, with or without an paper umbrella and straw.

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
steps: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Add vodka, triple sec, cranberry, and lime, and shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Moscow Mule
steps: Squeeze lime into a Collins glass or copper mug.
Drop in the spent lime shell.
Fill glass with ice and add vodka; top with chilled ginger beer to taste.

cocktails.name: Bloody Mary
ingredients: Dashes of salt and black pepper
steps: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and fill with ice.
Gently roll from one glass to another until chilled.
Strain into a Collins glass filled with fresh ice.
Garnish with a slice of lemon or lime

cocktails.name: Paloma
ingredients: 1/2 a lime, plus a wedge for garnish
steps: Fill a 10-ounce Collins glass with ice.
Juice the lime into the glass.
Add reposado tequila and a pinch of coarse salt.
Top with grapefruit soda and stir gently to combine

cocktails.name: Mimosa
ingredients: Optional extras like vodka, Grand Marnier, Chambord
steps: Fill eight champagne flutes half full with chilled sparkling wine.
Top with orange juice.
If you are using it, add 1 tablespoon of Grand Marnier to each glass.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
steps: Pour the whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters into a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir until outside of shaker is very cold to touch.
Place a maraschino cherry in each of two chilled cocktail glasses.
Dividing evenly, strain the contents of the shaker over cherries and serve immediately.
Garnish with lemon wedges. Serve.

cocktails.name: Long Island Iced Tea
steps: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Pour the vodka, gin, rum, tequila, Triple Sec, and lemon juice into the shaker.
Cover and shake vigorously to combine and chill.
Pour the mixture, ice and all, into 2 glasses or beer mugs and top off with the cola.
